channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: National Guard set to patrol Memphis but blocked in Illinois for 2 weeks
item.description: National Guard troops are expected to begin patrolling in Memphis. The patrols are expected Friday after a federal judge in Illinois ruled Thursday to block a deployment in the Chicago-area for at least two weeks.

item.title: Most states with National Guard troops in DC plan to withdraw this fall
Man convicted of killing a 15-year-old girl in her home in 2001 is executed by injection in Indiana
